turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I need to order a coffee, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a grande mocha latte from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what type of milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: a grande mocha with 2% milk, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where do you want to pickup your beverage?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From the Starbucks on Soldiers Field Road in Boston.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks on soldiersville road.
